content: this pattern is for crochet lavender applique this applique can be used to embellish a blanket pillow market bag it will look great on handmade cards or can be used for scrapbooking you can experiment with different yarn and hooks to make your lavender applique in different sizes as an example i made my applique in two sizes free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/lavender-crochet-pattern/ video tutorial https //youtu be/lcgc0dd1exa product safety this is a virus free pdf it contains embedded links to reputable websites all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external web sites gpsr representative ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie
